mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE(user_id, cafe_name, biz_number, tel, address_code, address_detail, operating_time, cafe_info, social_media, registration_date, update_date, wifi, reservation, parking_space, no_kids_zone, with_pet, cafe_condition, cafe_registration) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cafeName}, #{bizNumber}, #{tel}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail}, #{operatingTime}, #{cafeInfo}, #{socialMedia}, now(), now(), #{wifi}, #{reservation}, #{parkingSpace}, #{noKidsZone}, #{withPet}, #{cafeCondition}, #{cafeRegistration})
